attributes.action: save our green space from development
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
NEWPOOL MEADOWS IS A GREEN OPEN SPACE USED AND MUCH NEEDED BY OUR LOCAL COMMUNITY THE COUNCIL WANT TO SELL IT FOR DEVELOPMENT PLEASE HELP US TO SAVE OUR GREEN URBAN LUNG
FOR OUR CHILDREN AND FUTURE GENERATIONS

rejection.details: Please resubmit without the excessive us of block capital letters.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
